scripts.postinstall: cd app-backend && yarn install && cd ../app-client && yarn install
scripts.setup: npm install -g serverless && nvm install v6.10.3
scripts.all: yarn run server | yarn run client
scripts.test: cd app-backend && yarn test && cd ../app-client && yarn test
scripts.tslint: cd app-backend && yarn tslint && cd ../app-client && yarn tslint
scripts.eslint: cd app-backend && yarn eslint && cd ../app-client && yarn eslint
